bibl.title: Supplement II to J.K. Elliott, A Bibliography of Greek New Testament Manuscripts.
bibl.note: Supplement to: J. Keith Elliott, A Bibliography of Greek New Testament Manuscripts. 2nd Edition = Society for New Testament Studies. Monograph Series. 109 (Cambridge, 2000). Earlier supplements were published in: NT 46 (2004) pp. 376-400; - 49 (2007) pp. 370-401.
bibl.seg: J. Keith Elliott, Supplement III to J.K. Elliott, A Bibliography of Greek New Testament Manuscripts.
